ISSUE.TITLE: [0.3] activate adding wrong hook url
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When I active a gitlab repo it sets up the deploy key and the webhook but it seems like the webhook is incorrect: `http://10.1.7.87/v1/hook/gitlab.com?owner=:owner&name=:name` when it seems like it should be `http://10.1.7.87/api/hook/gitlab.com?owner=:owner&name=:repo`

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [AUTH] Increase Login/Register Token to 30 Day Lifetime (#510)
